first_two_sentences: David noticed he had put on a lot of weight recently. He examined his habits to try and figure out the reason.
Tom had a very short temper. One day a guest made him very angry.
Marcus needed clothing for a business casual event. All of his clothes were either too formal or too casual.
Bobby thought Bill should buy a trailer and haul it with his car. Bill thought a truck would be better for what he needed.
John was a pastor with a very bad memory. He tried to memorize his sermons many days in advance but to no avail.
Melody's parents surprised her with a trip to the big aquarium. Melody took a nap during the two hour car ride to the aquarium.
The math teacher announced a pop quiz as class began. While some students complained, he began passing out the quiz.
My first girlfriend i met on the internet. She lives about 4 hours away from me.
I got Charlie Horse when I was four years old. He's a brown stuffed horse, and at 35 I still sleep with him at night.
Laura loved corn. So she decided to grow some in her backyard.
